wikipedia_page.main: Sir Robert Scholey   (8 October 1921 – 12 January 2014) was the Chairman of British Steel from 1986 to 1992.

response: * Sir Robert Scholey (1921–2014), Bob Scholey, known as 'Black Bob', deputy chairman and chief executive of British Steel (1976–1986), Chairman of British Steel (1986–1992), succeeding Sir Robert Haslam
*Robert Scholey, C.B.E., Chairman, British Steel Corporation.
* Robert Scholey, Deputy Chairman, British Steel Corporation.
*Sir Robert Scholey, 92, British business executive, Chairman of British Steel (1986–1992).Sir Robert Scholey, a former chairman of British Steel, has died at his Much Hadham home
**Sir Robert Scholey, 92, business executive, Chairman of British Steel (1986–1992).
